about.content:
# GridScout is here! <:racingcar:1341846279486963854>

GridScout is a Discord bot designed for motorsport enthusiasts.
Whether you're looking for driver stats, race schedules, or past results, GridScout delivers the latest information right in your server.
## **How to Use**
To get started, type / in a chat to see a list of available commands.
If you need more help, head to [docs.gridscout.xyz](<https://docs.gridscout.xyz>).
## **Useful Links**
- <:web:1341845985512652850> [**Website**](<https://gridscout.xyz>)
- <:help:1341845993418788954> [**Support & Feedback**](<https://discord.gg/SdK9QCquP4>)
- <:terms:1341845978860355634> [**Terms of service**](<https://docs.gridscout.xyz/terms>) & [**Privacy Policy**](<https://docs.gridscout.xyz/privacy>)
- <:invite:1341845971822186648> [**Invite GridScout to Your Server**](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1239680594539974787&permissions=274878417984&integration_type=0&scope=bot+applications.commands)

If you enjoy using GridScout, please consider [voting for it on top.gg](<https://top.gg/bot/1239680594539974787>) to help more people discover it!

calendar.footer: ⏰ All dates above are shown in your local timezone

results.author: Race Results
results.error: **Error!** Cannot retrieve results data for the chosen race.
results.noSessions:
**Error!** No data available yet for this race.

Our data source typically updates data on the Sunday evening of each race week.
results.future: **Error!** The selected race has not yet taken place.

Select which notifications to receive and when using the dropdown menus below.
notifications.reminderTimeDescription: GridScout will send a reminder {{minutes}} minutes before
